title: Children's language in early reading (TEFC)
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Open University and Edward Milner
brief_description: Samples some of the early reading activities in two primary schools in Britain. These activities include use of word cards, sentence construction and reading of printed texts and children’s own stories.
description: Samples some of the early reading activities in two primary schools in Britain. These activities include use of word cards, sentence construction and reading of printed texts and children’s own stories.
